title: Haunting at Haverfordwest
description:
My special guest tonight is author G.L. Davies who's here to discuss a very frightening haunting that occurred in Haverfordwest. Get his book.

Want more paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.

Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now from anywhere in the world.

Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
Follow us on TikTok mysteriousradioTikTok
Follow us on Twitter @mysteriousradio
Follow us on Pinterest pinterest.com/mysteriousradio
Like us on Facebook Facebook.com/mysteriousradio
Visit our website: https://www.mysteriousradio.com

Check Out Mysterious Radio! (copy the link to share with your friends and family via text)



One of the spookiest writers around, G.L Davies dares you to enter his latest haunted house. A couple are pushed to breaking point as an entity possesses their home. Terrifyingly real, this is a must-read for horror fans.
NetGalley's Book of the Month nominee for November 2018

Blissful beginnings for a young couple turn into a nightmare after purchasing their dream home in Wales in 1989. Their love and their resolve are torn apart by an indescribable entity that pushes paranormal activity to the limit. Haunted: Horror of Haverfordwest is the prequel to the bestselling A Most Haunted House. Delve into this new true terrifying account complete with a new edit of the original bestseller A most haunted house and a summary of explanations for the ultimate paranormal testimonial. Join the investigation, Dare you step inside...
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
